attributes.action: Petition the Indian Government to end the cruelty involved in their leather trade
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: PETA reports that cows are transported in suffocating lorries.  Those too sick or injured to walk are beaten and have chilli peppers rubbed into their eyes.  In the abattoir they are bound by all four feet and thrown onto their sides on blood covered floors. Their throats are slit with dull knives whilst the other cows watch them bleed to death.
